## Installaing relevant libraries

```{r}
packages = c('ggiraph', 'plotly', 'DT', 'patchwork', 
             'gganimate', 'tidyverse', 'readxl', 'gifski',
             'gapminder')

for (p in packages){
  if(!require(p, character.only = T)){
    install.packages(p)
  }
  library(p, character.only = T)
}
```

exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")
